This winter, I’ve spent a lot of time cooking at home in an effort to not spend as much on takeout. But this means that I tend to have a lot of leftovers in my fridge. I don’t really mind it — I love some good leftovers to make easy lunches and dinners with — but I only have so many containers to store food in. I don’t want any of my hard work to go to waste, so I’m always happy to add more containers to my collection. No matter how many I own, I’ll always find a way to put them to good use. 

Naturally, when I found out that editor-loved brand Caraway was introducing a Mini Food Storage Set to its lineup, I had to grab one for myself! Not only is the set super cute, but it’s also perfect for all the random bits and bobs I end up with after cooking, like leftover sauces, roasted veggies, ground beef and chicken, and so much more. Not to mention, the containers are perfect for taking lunch to work, save so much space if you have a small kitchen, and are already on sale!

What Is the Caraway Mini Food Storage Set?

Earlier this month, Caraway — a brand our editors love for its non-toxic nonstick cookware and bakeware — came out with this Mini Food Storage Set. In the set, you get two 1.75-cup square containers, two 2.6-cup rectangular containers, and two 5-ounce dash containers, along with a magnetic organizer and a couple of straps so you can safely stash them in a lunchbox. Like the brand’s cookware and bakeware, the pieces also offer non-toxic ceramic coating, making them a breeze to clean — especially since you can also pop them right into the dishwasher. They’re also equipped with Caraway’s Air Release Technology, which locks in freshness and keeps odors out. 

Beyond that, these storage containers can also be used in the freezer, microwave, or oven up to 450°F, so you can even meal-prep some baked oatmeal in them or quickly reheat ground beef from yesterday’s dinner. Plus, this set comes in six colors that’ll look gorgeous in your kitchen. 

Why I Love the Caraway Mini Food Storage Set

As I mentioned, I own a lot of food storage containers, and yet I also never have enough. The thing is, many of my containers are fairly big, so when I need to store a little bit of leftover broccoli, mashed potatoes, shrimp, or sauce, I didn’t have many good options for that — until now. Now that I have this Mini Food Storage Set from Caraway, it’s so much easier to hold onto smaller amounts of leftovers than it was before and keep them fresh longer. Plus, they’re by far the prettiest in my collection.

And one aspect of this set that I really like is the windows on the lids of the rectangular and square containers. This feature allows me to effortlessly see what leftovers are in which container. I also love that everything is dishwasher-safe. For me to regularly use a food storage container, it has to be — the last thing I want to do when I unpack my lunchbox after work is scrub everything by hand (even if the containers do have a ceramic coating that makes handwashing light work).  

Between how cute these containers are, the fact that they can safely go in the dishwasher (as well as the oven and microwave), and that they’re such a good size for work lunches and cramped cabinets, I can’t recommend Caraway’s Mini Food Storage Set enough. And it’s a great bonus that you can score it for less right now!

Buy: Caraway Mini Food Storage Set, $125 (normally $160)
